original_title: North Korea has a secret missile base that poses a ‘potential nuclear threat’ to the US, new report says | CNN
article_summary: North Korea has a secret missile base near its border with China, reportedly storing up to nine nuclear-capable ICBMs, posing a potential nuclear threat to East Asia and the United States, according to a new report. The base, Sinpung-dong, is believed to be one of many undeclared missile bases and warhead storage facilities in North Korea. The report warns of the geographical advantage of its location near China, potentially deterring attacks due to potential fallout impacting China.</s>
